articles.description: European Council President Charles Michel on Tuesday (Mar 9) rejected charges of "vaccine nationalism" levelled against the EU, saying that while Britain and the United States have outright bans on exports of COVID-19 shots, the EU had not stopped exporting.
articles.title: EU rejects accusations of COVID-19 'vaccine nationalism' - CNA
